recipe:
MM Punch
2L Pineapple juice 1.25L Lemonade 1.5L Cranberry juice 2 cans 440 gms Pineapple pieces in juice 2 punets strawberries washed and chopped 1 bunch mint washed and chopped 1 Lime finely sliced 1 1/2 cups Vodka (optional)
Place all items in fridge over night except ice (leave this in freezer.) Place all items in a large punch bowl and stir well. Add as much ice as desired (4-5 handfuls.)
